name: wowser
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to show surprise and sometimes pleasure: "Wowser! That felt fantastic," he said. You won! Wowsers!

Australian English informal disapproving someone who disapproves of people enjoying themselves, particularly if this involves alcohol: How do you address this country's alcohol problems without being viewed as some kind of a wowser?
